question_1: I always double-check that all the doors and windows are locked before going to bed, ensuring my family's safety and allowing us all to sleep peacefully through the night.
question_2: I often leave the doors and windows unlocked at night, trusting that nothing bad will happen and enjoying the thrill of living without constraints.

question_2: As a financial advisor, I encourage my clients to spend freely on experiences, believing that living in the moment is more important than worrying about future stability.
